caseTitle: Syed Mushahid Shah v. F.I.A., etc
authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE MIAN SAQIB NISAR, CJ
tagline: The provisions of the Financial Institutions (Recovery of Finances) Ordinance, 2001 are to have an overriding effect on anything inconsistent contained in any other law for the time being in force, including the Offences in Respect of Banks (Special Courts) Ordinance 1984, the Code of Criminal Procedure 1898 (read with the Pakistan Penal Code 1860) and the Federal Investigation Agency Act 1974 (read with the Banking Companies Ordinance 1962).
